Hero.title: High-Performance Charting Engine for <highlight>Financial Data</highlight>
Hero.description: Built for the financial industry, our real-time charting and drawing engine system supports millions of data points with smooth rendering and millisecond response times.

Features.title: Why Choose CandleView
Features.subtitle: Designed for high-performance financial visualization scenarios
Features.plugAndPlayDesc: Simple and quick integration, zero cost to get started, displaying a chart requires less than 10 lines of code, allowing users to focus on data integration.
Features.dataDrivenDesc: Flexible data structure support, real-time data updates, smooth transitions between historical and real-time data for seamless visualization.
Features.lowMemoryDesc: Innovative data compression algorithms reduce memory usage by 70%, supporting large-scale real-time data processing.
Features.professionalChartsDesc: Built-in candlestick charts, time-sharing charts, heat maps and other professional chart types, supporting custom extensions and technical indicators.
Features.multiPlatformDesc: Responsive design with dedicated mobile adaptation, perfectly adapting to desktop, mobile, and touch-screen trading terminals.
Features.highExtensibilityDesc: Rich APIs, style configurations, technical indicators, drawing tools, and coordinate axis extensions for unlimited customization possibilities.

Benchmark.title: Benchmark Benchmarks
Benchmark.subtitle: Benchmark in real financial data scenarios, exceeding industry standards
Benchmark.metricsDescription: Support WebSocket real-time data streams, millisecond updates, smooth rendering. Built-in intelligent data aggregation algorithms ensure smooth experience in high-frequency data scenarios.

TimeShowcase.title: Global Time Coverage & Timeframes
TimeShowcase.subtitle: Comprehensive timezone support and flexible timeframe options for global trading
TimeShowcase.timezoneFeatures: All timezones support automatic daylight saving time adjustments and real-time synchronization.
TimeShowcase.timeframeFeatures: Support quick switching, custom timeframe combinations, and multi-timeframe analysis.
TimeShowcase.globalCoverageDesc: Support for 20+ major timezones worldwide, covering all major financial markets and trading sessions.
TimeShowcase.multiTimeframeDesc: 24 levels of timeframes from seconds to months, supporting comprehensive multi-timeframe technical analysis.
TimeShowcase.realTimeSyncDesc: Automatic timezone conversion and daylight saving time adjustments for accurate time synchronization across markets.

ChartShowcase.title: Rich Chart Types & Tools
ChartShowcase.subtitle: Comprehensive technical indicators and drawing tools for professional financial analysis
ChartShowcase.basicChartsDesc: Professional financial charts for various analytical needs
ChartShowcase.lineChartDesc: Real-time line charts with precise data updates
ChartShowcase.areaChartDesc: Stacked area charts for trend analysis
ChartShowcase.mountainChartDesc: Filled area chart for trend visualization
ChartShowcase.highLowChartDesc: High and low price range chart
ChartShowcase.candlestickDesc: Professional-level candlestick charts with multiple technical indicators overlay support.
ChartShowcase.barDesc: Volume and comparison analysis with dynamic scaling.
ChartShowcase.pieDesc: Proportional analysis and portfolio breakdown visualization.
ChartShowcase.heatmapDesc: Big data heat maps to discover hidden market patterns.
ChartShowcase.indicatorFeatures: All indicators support real-time calculation, custom parameter adjustment, and multi-timeframe switching.
ChartShowcase.toolFeatures: All drawing tools support real-time dragging, style customization, and group management.
ChartShowcase.realTimeCalculationDesc: All technical indicators support real-time calculation with millisecond updates, ensuring timely data analysis.
ChartShowcase.smartInteractionDesc: Drawing tools feature intelligent snapping, auto-alignment, and history tracking for a smooth user experience.
ChartShowcase.highCustomizationDesc: Support custom indicator formulas, drawing tool styles, and shortcut configurations to meet personalized needs.

CTASection.title: Experience High-Performance Financial Charts Now
CTASection.subtitle: Join over 5,000+ financial institutions worldwide and start building your next-generation trading system

Footer.description: Next-generation high-performance charting engine built for fintech. Supporting WebGL, Canvas, SVG, real-time data streaming, and high-frequency trading.
